comments.commentBody: So the media is once again taking Trump's latest deflection attack seriously. Why? Let's trot out Occum's Razor and take the least complex and therefore most likely option: Trump is (once again) lying. The fact that this is a recurring theme for him simply reinforces the conclusion. He lies when he is attacked. He lies when he is embarrassed. He lies when he is deficient in comparison to his betters. He lies when he wants to provoke a response that distracts people from the real issues. He lies when he wants to appeal to his base of low-information supporters.  He lies when he wants to puff himself up. It is actually somewhat difficult to find a situational where he doesn't lie.
I can't take four years of this ... nonsense. Who can?
Vladimir and his oligarchs.  American oligarchs, too.
President Mr Trump should stop worrying about his phones being tapped and should start worrying about all our butts getting nuked by Mr.Kim.

I'm not an attorney, but Little Donald's statements sound slanderous to me.

I hope Obama sues his butt, and through the court system demands to see the evidence that prompted these rash public statements.

Trump is an unfortunate intellectually challenged person looking at facts that say he is a traitor of the United States.  Whatever this pathetic person responds he will be judged by people with an attitude that disqualifies them from being human. Trump is a fool and people who support him want America to fail. Pity.

Evidence? Who needs evidence? I'm still waiting NYT, to see the evidence that Russia tampered with our elections; so far, zip.  It's true - tell a lie often enough and people accept it as the truth.  Btw, the Obama administration continued to make it possible for the NSA to spy on anyone - why cloud the issue with wiretap warrant nonsense?

Really? You never saw the news reports? You never read the interviews with Russians who were paid to be involve themselves in our election? That is a fact. What we don't know yet is only to what extent the Trump campaign was involved. There is some, but not enough evidence of that. Why do you think Der Fuhrer is sending out so many tweets now??
How's the weather in Moscow, Dave?

News reports are evidence?  No - not even if they cross their hearts and promise it's true, it's not evidence.  Nor is the conclusion of 1 or 17 intelligence agencies if they can't provide any supporting evidence  open to public scrutiny.  "Because I said so..." is something only one's mother can get away with.

Just more evidence that the public must call him out, along with all his cronie Republican comrads. The public must march on Washington to demand the release his tax returns along with a bipartisan investigation of his and his administrations ties to Russia. Without this, we will never know to whom he is indebted. Why hasn't the story of his tax returns persisted?
Nothing he does is shocking anymore. What IS shocking is that he's still there doing it. C'mon, Congress--we're counting on you! You're our voice! Stop him!
You can thank the republicans

The president is a sick and manipulative man. He is only trying to distract the news from the Russian ties that are slowly but surely now coming to the surface. I pray the truth will come out eventually.

It's so obvious in what Trump is trying to do with his latest revelations about being wire tapped; it's just another distraction to divert the attention away from his "Russian" debacle.  Pure and simple.  He's running scared, and he knows that his time is about up.  He's failing, and he's failing fast.  What a sad sorry excuse for a president he is.  Show us your proof Donald, or just shut up.  What a seriously troubled man he is.  As he himself so often says, SAD.
Pence and his wife must lie in bed at night and chit-chat about how they'll decorate the residential rooms at the White House.  Let's face it, the Rump is not going to make it even six months.
And they failed big time in stopping the Russians! wake up!

He's deteriorating. Rapidly. Pathological lying and paranoia. WHEN will someone on our government have the courage to call crazy what it is and demand a psych evaluation for the sake of salvaging any hopes of stable government???

To the mental health professionals: it's time for you unite and intervene -- call this craziness out in one unified voice. SOME WHERE in this is an ethical obligation to prevent harm. Just do it before you also find yourself living in a dictatorship.

Many of us have done so. Over and over.

When an ordinary citizen can see it, there's no need for professionals!

According to Malcom Nance former CIA operative, he is getting "buggy".  A sign that the end is near and evidence will come out to implicate Donnie boy in Russia's role in the election. I hope he is correct so this madness can end.
Enjoy your vacation, Deb!

Hello Media:

Do you understand that there is more to being presidential than reading from a teleprompter? I'm looking at you Chris Wallace, Van Jones, Tom Brokaw, Jonathan Karl, Gayle King, to name just a few journalists who gushed over Trump's State of the Union speech, just 3 days ago. These tweets are the real Trump, not the other speech-giving so-called president Trump.

This man is unstable and not well.

The Republicans better decide that they love their country more than Trump, and do something. It's only been 42 days and this cannot continue as is.

As for the Russian fiasco, Trump doth protest too much.
Wish I could recomend this 1000 times, V.  The shallow, fawning and seemingly dimwitted talking heads on the cable news networks don't need much to be impressed, that's for sure.

Van Jones is the embarrassment of all embarrassments. What a joke. On election night he frets about what to tell his sons and now he sees someone Presidential?

The man has not improved from election day - but rather descended into further darkness and destructive behavior.

Land of Washington
Lincoln, Jefferson, Monroe
Devolves into Trump.
Maybe his phone was actually tapped by that  400 pound man sitting on his couch. He wanted to discover  how Trump found out about him.

And while the news-consuming public and the legitimate media all fixate on this latest diversion, we turn our gaze and our fact-finding pressure away from the REAL news stories, about a cabinet nominee lying in his confirmation hearing, and the possibility of active interference by a foreign power in our election.

It has happened so often, surely by now we should suspect that we are being cleverly manipulated! When the President makes such a spectacular effort to distract our attention, what is it that he is trying to keep us from seeing? This is his MO and we are fools if we allow ourselves to be taken in by it yet again. Fool the American people once, shame on you. Fool us twice, shame on us. Mr. Trump doesn't care if he is called a liar, as long as he can use basically silly lies to avoid being caught in something worse.
When will it become acceptable to question the pResident's mental state?  I'm serious.

Just to be clear, if there was a warrant approved based on probable cause to suspect a crime or that individuals in the Trump organization were acting as foreign agents, THERE WAS PROBABLE CAUSE! Don't let Trump's tantrum obscure this fact or distract from the very sobering (continued) evidence that this is far more serious than this administration will admit. Republicans, wake up and defend our country!
Sorry can't do, his majesty the Donald comes first.
If anyone would know about McCarthyism it would be the so-called president whose mentor in bellicose B* (baloney) was Roy Cohn, McCarthy's chief counsel.

Sessions recuses himself after clearly lying under oath. The White House is continually embroiled in scandals based on their connections to the Kremlin, more revealed each day. Quick! A smoke screen! Make an accusation without any evidence to support it! This is D.T.'s pattern, just like when he first found notoriety by denying housing to Blacks: make counter-accusations as a diversion.

Mr Trump:

Disclose your tax returns.
Disclose your relationship to Russia.
Disclose Bannon's dark philosophy and your faith in it.

Until these are addressed you can not distract us with your nonsense!
From your lips to God's ears. No offense, non-believers and others. You know what I mean. We're all the same at heart.

I hope most American do not become insensitive and get used these " sick and bad " occupiers of White House, President Bannon or Trump.
Hand book of building an autocratic regime :
Confusion, attack press , other religion, degrade freedom under false name and wait for a terrorist attack, then institute wide spread of power grab or even martial law.
Anything to get attentions away from Russian probe of his administration.
" Very Bad, Bad "
